tú
〔騊駼〕见“

駼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tú］
［《廣韻》同都切，平模，定。］
即騊駼。

駼字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駼； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1439第23
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?同都切，音徒。【玉篇】騊駼，良馬名。　又獸名。【山海經】北海有獸，狀如馬，名騊駼，色靑。【前漢·百官志】有騊駼監。　又國名。【揚雄·解嘲】今大漢，左東海，右渠搜，前番禺，後陶塗。【註】騊駼馬出北海上。陶塗，北方國名，本國出馬，因以爲名。　又【爾雅·釋畜騉駼註】騉駼，亦似馬而牛蹄。　又人名，後漢有劉騊駼。　又【宋書·符瑞志】亦作?。

騊駼，古代良马名。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　駼; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1439 Page 23
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? The same all cut, the sound disciple. 【Jade articles】騊駼, the name of a good horse.　Also the animal name. [Shan Hai Jing] There are beasts in the North Sea, resembling horses, named 騊駼, lustful. [Previous Han·Hundred Officials] There is a 騊駼Supervisor.　 Also the name of the country. [Yang Xiong·Interpretation] Today's Dahan, Zuo Donghai, You Qusou, former Panyu, and later Taotu. [Note] The horse is out of the North Sea. Taotu, the name of the northern country, was born in his own country for his name.　[Erya·Release the Note on the 騉騉駼] The 騉駼 is also like a horse but a hooves.　Another name, the Later Han Dynasty had Liu Weixiang.　[Song Shu·Fu Ruizhi] also made?.
